com.qtplaf.library.trading.server

Interface Account


  • public interface Account
    Access to account information.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getBalance()
      Returns account balance.
      java.util.Currency getCurrency()
      Returns the account currency.
      double getEquity()
      Returns the account equity in the account currency.
      double getLeverage()
      Returns the current leverage, normally stated by contract with the broker.
      double getMarginCutLevel()
      Returns the maximum use of leverage exceeding which will result in margin cut.
      double getOverWeekEndLeverage()
      Returns the maximum use of leverage exceeding which will result in margin cut.
      double getUsedLeverage()
      Returns the current use of leverage.
      double getUsedMargin()
      Returns the used margin in account currency.
      java.lang.String getUserName()
      Returns the user name.
      boolean isConnected()
      Returns a boolean indicating if account is connected to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • getBalance

        double getBalance()
        Returns account balance. The last account balance available is the balance for the previous end-of-day processing.
        Returns:
        balance

      • getCurrency

        java.util.Currency getCurrency()
        Returns the account currency.
        Returns:
        The account currency.

      • getEquity

        double getEquity()
        Returns the account equity in the account currency. The equity is normally calculated every N time, so at a given moment can be not accurate.
        Returns:
        The account equity in the account currency.

      • getLeverage

        double getLeverage()
        Returns the current leverage, normally stated by contract with the broker.
        Returns:
        The current leverage.

      • getMarginCutLevel

        double getMarginCutLevel()
        Returns the maximum use of leverage exceeding which will result in margin cut.
        Returns:
        The maximum use of leverage before margin cuts

      • getOverWeekEndLeverage

        double getOverWeekEndLeverage()
        Returns the maximum use of leverage exceeding which will result in margin cut. Value effective before weekends.
        Returns:
        The maximum use of leverage before margin cuts at weekends.

      • getUsedMargin

        double getUsedMargin()
        Returns the used margin in account currency.
        Returns:
        The used margin.

      • getUsedLeverage

        double getUsedLeverage()
        Returns the current use of leverage. Value returned by this function is for information purposes and can be incorrect right after order changes, as it is updated about every N time.
        Returns:
        The current use of leverage.

      • getUserName

        java.lang.String getUserName()
        Returns the user name.
        Returns:
        The user name.

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns a boolean indicating if account is connected to the server.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating if account is connected to the server.
